Text_lang: The Winter Queen has asked for you to deliver a message to Sire Denathrius, the Master of Revendreth. You will need his help for the coming conflict.
Test
Following an unprovoked assault on Bastion, you were tasked with journeying to Maldraxxus and investigating why the armies of the dead have betrayed their oath to defend the Shadowlands.

Using a set of blueprints you recovered and the destructive capabilities of the G.M.O.D. at your disposal, you and Gallywix managed to destroy an airship utilized by High Tinker Mekkatorque and set Alliance interests in Drustvar back even further.

Khadgar has summoned you to Dalaran to help him investigate a mysterious figure called the Harbinger who possesses a powerful relic called the Dark Heart. The Archmage has also asked Alleria Windrunner to join you in order to give her unique perspective.
You were summoned to Silithus to seek out Magni, the Speaker of Azeroth, in order to learn more about the mysterious Radiant Song being heard all across Azeroth.

Orweyna reveals that she found a recording from none other than Gallywix, the leader of the operations around Opportunity Point. But she is worried about what she heard behind a massive cave wall. Machines grinding and drilling with a purpose that remains hidden, for now...

You have traveled to the broker city of Tazavesh, now relocated among the ruins of K'aresh. There you have learned that the brokers and the ethereals are working together to save the remains of their shattered world.

You investigated acts of sabotage in Tazavesh and revealed that the Shadowguard ethereals are the culprits. Before you repair the damage, the Shadowguard launch an attack upon the city in the name of their master, Dimensius the All-Devouring.
Alleria Windrunner was on the hunt for Xal'atath when she received a message from her mentor, Locus-Walker, calling for help. She asked you to meet her in Dornogal.

You stopped the Shadowguard's assault on Tazavesh with the aid of Alleria and Locus-Walker. Alleria demands that Locus-Walker introduce us to his mysterious ally. He reveals that it is none other than Xal'atath, the Harbinger.
Locus-Walker tries to convince Alleria of the necessity of this unexpected alliance by showing you the threat that the Shadowguard and Dimensius pose to the Trust, and to K'aresh.

The K'aresh Trust has been betrayed by Shadowguard infiltrators. To stop them, Xal'atath transforms you into energy using a powerful artifact known as a Reshii Ribbon, just as she transformed the ethereals and brokers ages ago.
After helping Ve'nari stabilize and protect Eco-Dome: Primus, you head to the nearby Shadowguard camp to end the threat to the eco-dome and receive Ve'nari's Reshii Ribbon.
You destroyed the Shadowguard base that threatened Eco-Dome: Primus, but the group fractures when Xal'atath reveals secrets from Locus-Walker's past, and Alleria confronts him.

Locus-Walker is shaken by Alleria's loss of trust in him, but the threat of Dimensius grows. You lead your remaining companions on the hunt for other members of the Ravel to gain their Reshii Ribbons.

You arrived at Eco-Dome: Rhovan only to discover it destroyed, overrun, and the holder of the Reshii Ribbon murdered by barbaric Wastelanders. Your companions had history with these former oracles of the Worldsoul, and Xal'atath believes they would make excellent allies. But to gain their aid, Locus-Walker has to return to Tazavesh.
Xal'atath enacts a plan to ally the hostile Wastelanders to your cause. Under her direction, you prepare to draw out the leader of the group.

After summoning and defeating a creature of the Void in the Wastelander's camp, you are confronted by their chieftain, Soul-Scribe. Xal'atath offers her the chance to speak once more with the Worldsoul K'aresh, in exchange for her warriors and Reshii Ribbon.
Xal'atath convinces Soul-Scribe to perform a sacred ritual to contact K'aresh. The Wastelanders travel to the broker eco-dome known as the Oasis to perform the ritual.

Soul-Scribe was unable to complete the ritual and was about to attack. Xal'atath's forced the former oracle into contact with the Worldsoul K'aresh, saving you from the Wastelander's wrath. Grateful, Soul-Scribe pledged her Reshii Ribbon and her tribe to your cause against the Shadowguard.
You prepare for the ritual with the help of Xal'atath, who confides in you that she isn't certain Soul-Scribe or K'aresh still have the strength to complete the ritual.
